extendedInfo.description: Overkill is about shooting. Overkill is about loving and upgrading your gun. Overkill is about shedding the blood of your enemies and not having yours spilled. You will need quick reflexes and superior aiming skills to shoot your way out of this one. Do you have what it takes to clear all levels?*** NEW MULTIPLAYER ***Find yourself a worthy opponent and compete head-on with other players (3G and Wi-Fi). Become the best and boast your position in the top ranks!GO CROSS-PLATFORM: Have Apple players for breakfast! Take part in the fight and represent your platform!The Novice Tier offers battles featuring slower-paced enemies who take fewer shots before dying. You are issued a standard UMP 45 submachine gun with unlimited ammunition.More skilled players can upgrade to the Elite Tier, featuring enemies who are faster and harder to kill. Elite players compete using M16A4 SPECOPS rifles that can be upgraded to include additional stocks, magazines, scopes, foregrips and other accessories.The Elite Tier includes leaderboards, flying drones, bonus boxes and other features not found in the Novice Tier.The Sniper Tier is for the sharpest of shooters. You will face the most challenging enemies who will use all the resources they can to finish you. Your only friend is the deadly RSASS REMINGTON sniper rifle. Get most of it with powerful upgrades. Sniper Tier competitions last up to to 2,500 points.*** GREAT SINGLE PLAYER ***Civilized society has collapsed and your mission is to kill all you cross. Use an array of increasingly powerful weapons to eliminate anything that stands in your way. A bounty is paid for everything that is killed and destroyed. With the reward you can buy weapons and upgrades. Over 120 combinations of weapons! Fight through 100 waves and 5 extra Hell waves in 5 locations.*** OVER 10 MILLION PLAYERS ***30 RANKSGet promoted from Private to General18 WEAPONS TO UPGRADEThey include AK-47, M4, RPG, RG6, MP7, MAG, MG4, MSR, SCAR, MARV, HK 417, P90, TECH III, MAC UZI, ACR, XM8 & Gatling gun.100 WAVES100 waves with 5 extra hell waves in 5 locationsPLENTY OF ENEMIES TO KILLDifferent enemies to kill, heavy flying drones to destroyOTHER FEATURESâ¢ lots of blood, explosions â¢ awesome high-definition graphicsâ¢ music and realistic sound effects â¢ upgrade your weapon the way you likeâ¢ detailed Stats to measure your progress (kills, bullets shot, accuracy, etc.)MEDAL STORE AND OVERKILL MEDALS:Overkill is FREE to download. Although some powerful weapons and upgrades are locked. Thatâs why we introduced Overkill Medals (OM). For OM you can get all the extra stuff thatâs in game (weapons, upgrades, themes, etc). There are several ways to get OM:â¢ as In App Purchaseâ¢ FREE using TAPJOYâ¢ by sharing Overkill with friends via e-mail or Facebookâ¢ for every promotion

reviews.title: Perfection
reviews.comment: This is a very smooth and overall amazing game, multiplayer is fantastic, no lagging or bugs. Great game!!
reviews.author: Brandon Smith

reviews.title: Pretty
reviews.comment: Good game but if guns can be bought with money then it was better. Devs you must know difference between good and better.
reviews.author: Subir Gupta

reviews.title: This is the best
reviews.comment: Well good it tottaly rocked my world man. I recommened it totally if you don\'t like this game go play fluffy bunnys or something! LOL

reviews.title: Awesomeness
reviews.comment: I love this game its so fun to play i give this a five star
reviews.author: Anthony Hall

reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!!
reviews.comment: Outstanding game!!!!  You earn money and credits to upgrade weaponry without spending YOUR OWN REAL MONEY unlike some other stupidass games I\'ve tried!!  AWESOME!!  KEEP UP THE GOOD WORK!!!!!!!

reviews.comment: This game is okey.. Jus kindda tym pass!!! If u love guns thn tis game \'ll b a good source of fun for u guys!

reviews.title: Best Shooting Game
reviews.comment: The game is smooth...no lags in my Samsung Galaxy Pocket....Fun and Addicting...Very Nice....5 Stars!!!

reviews.title: What\'s going on???
reviews.comment: I see others that have my phone, can play but I can\'t, it keeps saying weak signal, I don\'t have problems with other games, what can I do to play this game

reviews.title: Amazing
reviews.comment: I meet so many people here and all friendly and the game it self is amazing and just everything is epic so please keep up the updates and yea thanks so much best gme ive played here just eic  and please please please more updates its just soooo amaing so yea greatest game ive played The Gamer

reviews.title: Neil.94
reviews.comment: The best 1st person shooter on Android, it\'s great and fantastic, the best part is it\'s multiplayer feature which is just perfect, I get to shoot with other Android and even apple users, don\'t think twice about getting this game
reviews.author: Neil Arul

reviews.title: Love it!
reviews.comment: I\'m a girl and I\'m into these games! Thought it would be worth a try. I have no complaints! My favorite game by far!
reviews.author: Tianna twiss

reviews.title: Too repetitive
reviews.comment: Gets boring after ten minutes or so. The scene never changes. Also, it\'s no good on a phone with a smaller screen - too difficult to aim in the harder levels.
reviews.author: A Chopra

reviews.title: From 5 Star to 1 Star
reviews.comment: Returning back to a good game only to find a pop-up stating that 50-70 mb of additional data is needed to run.  Sorry Charlie, but no dice. DELETED.
reviews.author: C Ne

reviews.title: Great Game
reviews.comment: I love the multiplayer, especially the cross platform ability. This is one of my favorite single player games, too, because it is similar to some other console games I like. I strongly reccomend tnis game!
reviews.author: Austin Schultz

reviews.title: Smooth
reviews.comment: Informative, addictive, bug free = enjoyable. Well done crane balls

reviews.title: Well worth downloading
reviews.comment: NOT LIKE NO OTHER, ITS CHALLENGING; TRUST IT WONT BE A WASTE OF YOUR TIME......

reviews.comment: Awesome

reviews.title: Addictive
reviews.comment: I played the original version and that was good but needed improvement, so meet the improvement. The new multiplayer option offsets the slightly more challenging gameplay. Also having a gigantic minigun doesn\'t hurt either.

reviews.title: awesome
reviews.comment: this game is so realistic so cool yeah i was finding shooting and fps found this and i love it spended my time playing this cool game heck yeah!

reviews.title: Good game,
reviews.comment: But if used to play multiplayer it always say that connection lost.. even though the our wifi is very fast
